channel.title: The New NemmyPK Development
channel.description:
RSCD V25 as source.
This is a PK server note that before you make any suggestions. Quests are okay. Note i will always keep this topic updated. Please help me make a good server and suggest things!
14.12.2008, 8:34 GMT+3: Server: -Fixed dupe bug. -Respawn in Edgeville. -Cave to enter when you want to go wildy.
14.12.2008, 8:34 GMT+3: Client: -Webclient in process.

item.title: The New NemmyPK Development
item.dc:creator: @henry henry
item.description:
@henry wrote:

there is so many of them because people enjoy doing it. i think i could recode a server 5 times exactly the same and still enjoy doing it.

Read full topic

item.title: The New NemmyPK Development
item.dc:creator: @xEnt xEnt
item.description:
@xEnt wrote:

a Genius idea is worth more than the code it’s self, as the code is basically the easier part to people who are capable.

Read full topic

item.title: The New NemmyPK Development
item.dc:creator: @_RSC_Coder ¤RSC[]Coder¤
item.description:
@_RSC_Coder wrote:

[quote=“mapu, post:10, topic:250460”][quote author=¤RSC[]Coder¤ link=topic=330317.msg2582064#msg2582064 date=1229293305]

Allright, here’s some:
No points, it’s enough of them already.
No non-devolopt RSCD v25
Make something unique.

What would be that unique?
[/quote]

People tend to keep their genius idea’s to themselves. That way somebody doesn’t get credit for their ideas.

It looks to me like you lack the imagination to do anything cool and interesting. If you are asking for others idea’s on a open board I doubt you will receive anything usefull.

All I can suggest is get your own private boards, find a team of developers and brainstorm for a good two weeks.[/quote]
Yeah i got few ideas myself, im adding them in actually.

Read full topic

item.title: The New NemmyPK Development
item.dc:creator: @mapu mapu
item.description:
@mapu wrote:

[quote=“¤RSC[”]Coder¤ link=topic=330317.msg2582064#msg2582064 date=1229293305]

Allright, here’s some:
No points, it’s enough of them already.
No non-devolopt RSCD v25
Make something unique.

What would be that unique?[/quote]

People tend to keep their genius idea’s to themselves. That way somebody doesn’t get credit for their ideas.

It looks to me like you lack the imagination to do anything cool and interesting. If you are asking for others idea’s on a open board I doubt you will receive anything usefull.

All I can suggest is get your own private boards, find a team of developers and brainstorm for a good two weeks.

Read full topic
